channel.title: Trisidiax V3 anyone have it?
channel.description:
basicly i did post this yesterday so dont complain because i still havnt had answers...
i need help with the trisidiaX v3 client and source because when i try to load the run.bat on source it does not work. any suggestions?

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

@echo off
color a
title TrisidiaX Server Running!
so its hardly messed up?[/quote]why did you take off lol I was just giving you the bottom part I figured you would keep the top part … add the top part to teh top of it again. All I added was (x86)

make sure you have 64 bit java downloaded btw

item.title: Trisidiax V3 anyone have it?
item.dc:creator: @mattfleckney mattfleckney
item.description:
@mattfleckney wrote:

sorry should of mentioned this, it says(not exact obvs)
first of all some stuff about trisidia
then says “cannot find specified path” (or what ever)
it supposed to bring up the console and start running the server instead it doesnt do either and just says some random stuff

i did have some help with getting it up and the guy helped me change the whole run.bat here is the orriginal and new run.bat
original:
@echo off
color a
title TrisidiaX Server Running!
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

new:
“C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic
